entry.summary: The conversation revolves around getting acknowledgments (ACKs) on the default settings for UPnP on bitcoin and bitcoind. Specifically, they are seeking ACKs from everyone, especially Gavin, on having UPnP enabled by default on bitcoin and disabled by default on bitcoind. Additionally, they are seeking general ACKs on the release of version 0.3.24 with the originally planned features. The context ends with a signature attachment that appears to be a digitally signed message part.
